mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, userName, userId, subject, content, checkNotice, hitCount, created, userIdx) VALUES(#{num}, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{checkNotice}, 0, SYSDATE, #{userIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN user1 m ON n.userId=m.userId

SELECT n.num, n.userId, n.userName, subject, hitCount, created FROM notice n JOIN user1 m ON n.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, n.userId, n.userName, subject, content, created, hitCount FROM notice n JOIN user1 m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
